mdRecord.dcterms:title: Minutes Book from Pine Creek Primitive Baptist Church.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: Record Book from Pine Creek Primitive Baptist Church. This volume includes the original Covenant of the Baptist Church on the Little River, member lists, minutes of meetings, and a list of the Sisters and Preachers that presided over the congregation. There are several handwritten deeds included in the volume.
mdRecord.dcterms:subject: Baptist churches
Churches
mdRecord.dcterms:provenance: Virginia Polytechnic Institute and State University. University Libraries
